mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.huodongfabu_name as huodongfabuName ,a.huodongfabu_types as huodongfabuTypes ,a.huodongfabu_photo as huodongfabuPhoto ,a.huodongfabu_content as huodongfabuContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM huodongfabu a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.huodongfabu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.huodongfabuName},'%')
and a.huodongfabu_types = #{params.huodongfabuTypes}
and a.huodongfabu_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.huodongfabuContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
